alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Johnson; Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Shelby, southeastern Hancock, Rush and east central Johnson Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Rushville to near Franklin. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rushville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 90 and 94. Interstate 74 between mile markers 105 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and east central Indiana.
